resources.string: Are you sure you want to cheat?
The city Alexandria was named after Alexander the Great?
After five nominations he received in the Best Director category, Alfred Hitchcock finally won an Academy Award for directing "Psycho"?
The last dynasty in China was the Chou dynasty?
The first set of Crayola crayons had eight colors?
King Tut was one of the longest-reigning kings of ancient Egypt?
Spiders belong to the "insect" class of animals?
Veins look blue because the oxygen-depleted blood in them is blue?
The Oscar-winning film "Good Will Hunting" (2001) deals with schizophrenia?
